file_content.text: Unless you have something else for me, I have no further use for you.
Hmm? Ah, Savorin is becoming more generous in his tributes. Pass on the gratitude of House Thul.
I'm sorry, I have no time for mercenaries.
Ah, always a pleasure to meet one of our Sith patrons.
Greetings, Imperial. Wonderful day to seize a crown, no?
